name: Biokript PRO
description: Biokript Pro is a patented hybrid decentralized trading platform built on Solana and supported by Microsoft and Google through their startup programs. The project focuses on solving key challenges in on-chain trading, including the lack of reliable stop-loss execution and the high frequency of rug pulls. Biokript introduces an infrastructure that allows users to retain full control of their funds while benefiting from automated protection tools, advanced trade execution, and transparent fee structures. The platform blends speed, user safety, and real utility to create a next-generation trading environment for both new and experienced traders.
